manhattan.datacorrection

クラス SourceTimeFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • manhattan.datacorrection.SourceTimeFunction
  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    BoxcarSourceTimeFunction, SourceTimeFunctionByStackedPeaks, TriangleSourceTimeFunction

    public abstract class SourceTimeFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    Source time function.
    You have to multiply
    Source time function: stf[0], .. stf[np-1]
    on
    Waveform in frequency domain: U[1].. U[np], respectively.
    導入されたバージョン:
    2015/08/02, 2015/8/5 writeSourceTimeFunction(Path, OpenOption...) installed, 2015/8/6 readSourceTimeFunction(Path) throws IOException
    バージョン:
    0.0.1, 0.0.2, 0.0.2.1
    作成者:
    kensuke

      • computeSourceTimeFunction

        public static SourceTimeFunction computeSourceTimeFunction(int np,
                                                           double tlen,
                                                           double samplingHz,
                                                           double[] obs,
                                                           double[] syn)
        Source time function is computed simply by division.
        パラメータ:
        obs - waveform of observed
        syn - waveform of syn
        np - steps of frequency [should be same as synthetics]
        tlen - [s] length of waveform [should be same as synthetics]
        samplingHz - [Hz]
        戻り値:
        Source time function F(obs)/F(syn) in frequency domain
